title: 'Endeavour'
brief_description: H.M.N.Z.S. Endeavour takes the New Zealand party for the British Trans-Antarctic Expedition to the Antarctic. Members of the party carry out oceanographic research, help build Scott Base and restore Scott’s and Shackleton’s huts before the ship brings Sir Vivian Fuchs, Sir Edmund Hillary and other expedition members back to New Zealand
